narrative.narrative: Jubba Airways is an airline with its headquarters in Nairobi,Kenya buts its hubs in Mogadishu,Somalia and Hargeisa,Somalia. It also has a secondary hub at Djibouti. It has 5 destinations in Somalia, one in Kenya,one in Saudi Arabia, one in the UAE and Djibouti. It has two 737-200's, a 737-300 and a leased 737-400 from East Air as of 2014. It was founded in 1998 and started the same year, by two Somali entrepreneurs living in Calgary,Canada.
